definition: A person who provides medical care and assistance to patients, typically in a hospital or healthcare setting. This term is commonly used to refer to a specific profession within the medical field.

examples.german: Die Krankenschwester kümmert sich um die Patienten.
examples.english: The nurse takes care of the patients.

examples.german: Meine Schwester arbeitet als Krankenschwester in einem Krankenhaus.
examples.english: My sister works as a nurse in a hospital.

examples.german: Die Krankenschwester hat mir eine Spritze gegeben.
examples.english: The nurse gave me an injection.

examples.german: Die Krankenschwester überprüft regelmäßig den Blutdruck der Patienten.
examples.english: The nurse regularly checks the blood pressure of the patients.
